Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army - a spin-off series of Sniper Elite, whose eventsare not based on historical materials. This time, players are invited to the opportunity of attacking the crowds walking dead. In Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army player acts as a sniper by the name of Charles Fairbairn - one of the last "live" in Germany. Rest of the population has turned into zombies, so any counter person, be it American, German or Russian - an ally in the fight against monsters.
